content: offers full and complete instructions to make this bright and cheerful blanket approximate finished size will be 33 x 33 the pattern will be available for you to download in pdf format directly after your payment is received materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size j - tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products
